title: About That Hazard Pay
description: We spend a morning at a grocery store and we ask: How much is essential work worth? | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: About That Hazard Pay
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Many essential workers right now are low paid. And they're being asked to risk more. Titles got fancier but their job got worse. So... why aren't these workers getting paid more?
itunes:subtitle: Many essential workers right now are low paid. And they're being asked to risk more. Titles got fancier but their job got worse. So... why aren't these workers getting paid more?
